column2: "Na mbaa beesuon bosuo ɔbarimba baako mu wɔ da no mu
column5: yeefura hɛnara hɛn atam: ma wɔmfa wo dzin nto hɛn do ara: na yi hɛn enyimguase wɔ hɛn do."

column2: "Da no mu na EWURADZE no dubaa no bɛyɛ fɛɛfɛw na enyimnyam
column3: na asaase no do aba bɛyɛ abɔso na enyisɔ ama Israel mu hɔn a woefi nsa no."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ nyia wɔgye no wɔ Zion
column3: na nyia ɔka wɔ Jerusalɛm no
column5: mekyerɛ obiara a wɔakyerɛw ne dzin afora atseasefo mu wɔ Jerusalɛm:"

column2: "ber a EWURADZE enya ahohor Zion mbabaa ho fi
column3: na ɔdze atsɛmbu sunsum na ɔhyew sunsum ebeyi Jerusalɛm bɔgya efi kurow no mu no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɛyɛ nsuwusiw na wusiw adzekyee
column3: na ogyaframee hyerɛn anadwe dze akata Zion bepɔw do tsenabea nyina
column4: na n’ehyiadzi nyina do: na enyimnyam no nyina benya nkatado."

column2: "Na ɔbɛyɛ ntamadan a ɔma nwin ewiaber fi ɔhyew mu
column3: na ɔayɛ guandɔbea na huntsabea wɔ ehum na nsutɔ mu."
